interpretation:
The "face in clouds" card is a symbol of mental fog and confusion. It suggests a lack of clarity and uncertainty about the future, as well as a feeling of being lost or disoriented. This card can indicate a need to take a step back and clear your mind before making any important decisions. It may also suggest a need to seek guidance or advice from others, as you are not seeing things clearly on your own. 

Associated keywords include: confusion, uncertainty, mental fog, disorientation, lack of clarity, seeking guidance.
